PHOENIX -- Matt Olson’s finest night of the season went to waste as the Braves committed far too many mental mistakes while blowing a four-run lead in an 8-7 loss to the D-backs in 10 innings on Tuesday night at Chase Field.
“We didn’t play well enough to win…

articles.title: David Puig competing in national championship final, then LIV Golf opener - Golf Channel
articles.description: Arizona State junior David Puig will battle for an NCAA team title on Wednesday, and then compete in the first LIV event
articles.content:
